name: And now, time to study
description:
When Kumaro Naoto is forced to move to another city for job reasons regarding his father, he enters Mendoza Gakuen, a high school specialized in raising sports stars. He’s not good at all with sports, more like the nerd type, and is a bit worried about how he’ll fit in there. Put yourself in his shoes and experience it first-hand!

Available in English and Spanish.

English version 1.24 IS OUT!

Finally, it’s here! The next English version of the game, reviewed and expanded, ready for all of you to enjoy! One more day at Mendoza Gakuen, full of events to the brim, and quite some routes which start to really branch out, giving you some more replay value. Are you willing to give private lessons to Reiko-san? You can do it! Do you want to play volleyball? Check! What kind of motley situations can Naoto get himself into? Find out yourself and enjoy the story!

Actualización de la versión en español: ¡Y ahora, a estudiar 1.47 ya disponible!

Empezamos a sumergirnos en el Acto 3 de la historia, si bien sólo en la rama de Naho y Yabuki. Disfrutad de este largo tramo adicional si os habéis metido en esta sección del argumento.
